name: pdf-writer
description: Allows users to create a PDF easily using this package.

scripts.prepublish: babel  pdfwriter.es6 --out-file pdfwriter.js && babel pdf_structure.es6 --out-file pdf_structure.js && babel constants.es6 --out-file constants.js && babel defaultConstants.es6 --out-file defaultConstants.js

author: Jim Abele <James.Abele@fda.hhs.gov>
